thread.title: France’s Deezer Aims for $1 Billion Value in IPO
thread.title_full: France’s Deezer Aims for $1 Billion Value in IPO - WSJ

author: Sam Schechner
title: France’s Deezer Aims for $1 Billion Value in IPO
text:
PARIS—Music-streaming service Deezer is aiming at a valuation of over $1 billion in a public offering later this month, saying it expects strong revenue growth in coming years from selling individuals monthly subscriptions to music libraries.
The Paris-based company said Thursday morning that it plans to sell a roughly 30% stake in the company on the Paris stock exchange at a value of €300 million ($344.46 million), at the low end of...
